类 DufsAutoConfiguration

java.lang.Object
io.github.lishangbu.avalon.dufs.autoconfiguration.DufsAutoConfiguration
@EnableConfigurationProperties(DufsProperties.class) @AutoConfiguration public class DufsAutoConfiguration extends Object

    • dufsRestClient

      @Bean @ConditionalOnMissingBean(name="dufsRestClient") @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="dufs", name="url") public org.springframework.web.client.RestClient dufsRestClient(DufsProperties properties)
      用于请求的web客户端
      • 处理重定向支持,参考github issues的处理
      • 添加默认访问地址
      返回:
      Rest 请求客户端

    • dufsClient

      @Bean @ConditionalOnMissingBean(DufsClient.class) public DufsClient dufsClient(@Qualifier("dufsRestClient") org.springframework.web.client.RestClient restClient)
